document.full_text: lebron james showed his value to the miami heat on the defensive side of the court in their 101-93 overtime win over the chicago bulls on tuesday, stopping the man who replaced him as the league's mvp -- derrick rose.
document.title: lebron shows his defensive value in battle with rose
lines_and_colors: lebron james showed his value to the miami heat on the defensive side of the court in their 101-93 overtime win over the chicago bulls on tuesday, stopping the man who replaced him as the league's mvp -- derrick rose.
